meanings.sent1: The premixt ingredients made baking the cake much easier.
meanings.sent2: The premixt paint saved us a lot of time on our home improvement project.
meanings.sent3: The premixt smoothie was so well-mixed, it practically danced in the blender.
meanings.sent4: Her premixt emotions were like a colorful palette waiting to be expressed.
meanings.sent5: The premixt solution glowed with a harmonious blend of colors.

meanings.definition: A mixture that has been pre-blended
meanings.sent1: I bought a premixt of spices for my favorite recipe.
meanings.sent2: The premixt for the concrete saved us a lot of time on the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The premixt of jokes in the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The premixt of flavors in the soup created a symphony in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The premixt of scents in the air was like a fragrant bouquet.
